titleStmt.title: Calisto, or, The chaste nimph, the late masque at court as it was frequently presented there, by several persons of great quality : with the prologue, and the songs betwixt the acts / all written by J. Crowne.
titleStmt.author: Crown, Mr. (John), 1640?-1712.
Staggins, Nicholas, 1650?-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Newcomb, for James Magnes and Richard Bentley ...

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Without the music by Nicholas Staggins.
